ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Excellent for those interested in the Middle East and/or anthropology.

This was a wonderful class. You read a book a week, have a few short assignments (discussion questions and book reviews) spread throughout the semester, and just hang out with Professor Inhorn exchanging stories and talking about books. What could be better?

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: I'm not sure if I'm going into academia-this class might be marginally more useful if you are planning to (particularly if you want to become an anthropologist in the Middle East).
